name: Add new LinkedIn lead gen form responses to Google Sheets
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this template that connects LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms and Google Sheets. Every time a new response is submitted through your LinkedIn Lead Gen Form, Make will automatically add the lead's information as a new row in your Google Sheets. This streamlined workflow ensures that you never miss a potential client and can easily track and analyze your leads in one centralized location. Perfect for marketers looking to enhance their lead management process!
